[File: aptos-core/state-sync/storage-service/server/src/logging.rs] [Enum: LogEntry] [Deserialization] Although LogEntry only derives Serialize (not Deserialize), could future addition of Deserialize enable deserialization attacks if logs are ever read back into the system? (Low)
